name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click Opens Link New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Same as 'Right Click Opens Link New Tab Correct Order', that disapeared from the chrome store but now is back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens links with a right click in background (default) or foreground maintaining correct order

10/12/2004 - Now with blacklist support, eg *bbc.co.uk will disable the right click functionality on bbc site

All perfectly legit and clean source code just upgraded for manifest v3 available here https://github.com/Bigsy/rightclicklinkopentab
